mapper.select: select id from school_user where is_deleted = 0 and name = #{username} and type = #{type} order by id desc limit 1
select id,name,nickname,sex,phone,language,country,city,area from school_user where is_deleted = 0 and name = #{name} and type = #{type} limit 1
select id,name,nickname,sex,phone,language,country,city,area from school_user where is_deleted = 0 and name = #{name} and password = #{password} and type = #{type} limit 1
select id,name,nickname,sex,phone,language,country,city,area from school_user where is_deleted = 0 and phone = #{phone} and type = #{type} order by id desc limit 1

select r.id,r.name,r.name_en,r.icon,r.address,r.parent_id from school_resources r left join school_role_resources rs on r.id=rs.resources_id and rs.is_deleted=0 left join school_role o on rs.role_id=o.id and o.is_deleted=0 left join school_user u on o.id=u.role_id and u.is_deleted=0 where r.is_deleted=0 and r.type=1 and u.name = #{name}
